exercises.wordLinkingDesc: Memorize and recall a sequence of words

wordLinkingInstructions.step1: You'll see a list of words displayed one by one
wordLinkingInstructions.step2: Memorize them by imagining a story connecting each word to the next
wordLinkingInstructions.step3: After the study phase, type all the words you remember
wordLinkingInstructions.step4: Order doesn't matter, but you get bonus points for correct sequence!

namesFacesInstructions.step1: You'll see faces paired with names one at a time
namesFacesInstructions.step2: Associate each face with its name using distinctive features
namesFacesInstructions.step3: After studying, you'll see the same faces without names
namesFacesInstructions.step4: Type the correct name for each face shown

numberPegInstructions.step1: You'll see a sequence of digits with their peg words (e.g., 1=Sun, 2=Shoe)
numberPegInstructions.step2: Create a mental story linking each peg word to the next
numberPegInstructions.step3: After studying, recall the original digit sequence
numberPegInstructions.step4: Use the numpad or keyboard to enter the numbers in order

welcome.title: Welcome to Memorio!
welcome.content: Your journey to mastering memory techniques starts here. This quick tour will help you understand how to use the platform and get the most out of your practice.

wordLinking.title: Word Linking
wordLinking.content: Create vivid mental associations between words to remember them. You'll study a list of words, then recall them by building a chain of connections. The more creative and bizarre your associations, the better!
wordLinking.step1: Study phase: Read and visualize connections between words
wordLinking.step2: Recall phase: Enter the words in any order you remember
wordLinking.step3: Get feedback on your accuracy and see what you missed

namesFaces.title: Names & Faces
namesFaces.content: Master the art of remembering names by associating faces with memorable features. Study faces paired with names, then test your recall by matching them correctly.
namesFaces.step1: Study phase: Look at each face and associate it with the name
namesFaces.step2: Recall phase: Type the correct name for each face shown
namesFaces.step3: Learn which associations worked and which need practice

numberPeg.title: Number Peg System
numberPeg.content: Use the peg system to memorize numbers by converting them into memorable images. Each digit (0-9) has a corresponding word or image. Create stories linking these images to remember sequences.
numberPeg.step1: Study phase: See digits paired with their peg words
numberPeg.step2: Create a mental story connecting all the peg images
numberPeg.step3: Recall phase: Enter the digit sequence you remember

learningHub.title: Learning Hub
learningHub.content: Expand your knowledge with curated articles and interactive quizzes. The Learning Hub provides in-depth guides on memory techniques, study strategies, and cognitive science.
learningHub.step1: Browse articles organized by categories and topics
learningHub.step2: Read comprehensive guides on memory techniques
learningHub.step3: Test your knowledge with interactive quizzes

adaptiveLearning.title: Adaptive Learning
adaptiveLearning.content: The platform adapts to your skill level automatically. As you improve, exercises become more challenging. Your mastery is tracked using a smart algorithm that knows when you need to review.
adaptiveLearning.step1: Start at your current level and progress naturally
adaptiveLearning.step2: Review skills when they're about to be forgotten
adaptiveLearning.step3: Track your progress with detailed analytics

hero.title:
Stop forgetting.
Start mastering.
hero.subtitle: Train your brain with the techniques used by memory champions. Master names, numbers, and lists through active recall and spaced repetition.

methodology.title: Built for results.
methodology.subtitle: We don't just flash cards at you. We use proven cognitive science to ensure information moves from short-term to long-term memory.

feature1.title: BKT Algorithm
feature1.desc: Bayesian Knowledge Tracing predicts exactly when you're about to forget something and schedules a review.

feature2.title: Active Recall
feature2.desc: Move beyond passive reading. Our exercises force your brain to retrieve information actively.

feature3.title: Gamified Progress
feature3.desc: Earn badges, maintain streaks, and grow your forest. Making memory training addictive.

exercises.subtitle: Targeted workouts for different memory types.

exercise1.title: Word Linking
exercise1.subtitle: Chain Method

exercise2.title: Names & Faces
exercise2.subtitle: Social Recall
